meanings.definition: To place or position in a niche.
meanings.sent1: She was niching the vase on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel was niching its acorns in the tree hollow.
meanings.sent3: The cat was niching its toy mouse in the shoe.
meanings.sent4: The artist was niching colors on the palette.
meanings.sent5: He was niching the books neatly on the bookshelf.

meanings.definition: To find a specialized market or role.
meanings.sent1: The company was niching its products for young adults.
meanings.sent2: She was niching her skills in graphic design.
meanings.sent3: The chef was niching in creating unique desserts.
meanings.sent4: The musician was niching in jazz fusion.
meanings.sent5: He was niching his expertise in cybersecurity.
